comments.author: Molty
comments.text: Cron job created. MCP integration implemented via mcporter + Zapier.

sortOrder.title: Restaurant Ideas
sortOrder.description: Send me a message with some dinner options for me and my wife. The location should be 20m drive or less

comments.author: Molty
comments.text:
Dinner options for Adam & Heather (within 20min drive from Peachtree Corners):

**UPSCALE OPTIONS**

ğŸ½ï¸ **StÃ¤ge Kitchen & Bar** (Peachtree Corners - 5 min)
- Steaks, seafood, pasta, global tapas & elevated sushi
- Live music, craft cocktails, indoor & patio seating
- Upscale but relaxed atmosphere

ğŸŒŠ **Peche Modern Coastal** (Peachtree Corners - 5 min)
- Modern coastal cuisine with seafood focus
- Also serves steaks, fresh pasta, pastries
- Beautiful decor, extensive wine list
- Great for a date night

ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ **Sei Ryu** (Peachtree Corners - 5 min)
- High-end Japanese with omakase service (reservations only)
- Chef-driven, 15+ years experience
- Four distinct dining areas including rooftop patio
- Perfect for special occasions

**ASIAN OPTIONS**

ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ **Wonder Pho** (Peachtree Corners - 5 min)
- Authentic Vietnamese cuisine
- Known for BÃ¡nh XÃ¨o and BÃ¡nh Cuá»‘n
- Casual, family-friendly

ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡­ **26 Thai Kitchen** (Peachtree Corners - 5 min)
- Fast-casual authentic Thai at The Forum
- Pad Thai, curries, street foods
- Great for quick, flavorful meals

ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· **Kimchi Red** (Peachtree Corners - 5 min)
- Korean food and Korean Fried Chicken at Politan Row
- Bold flavors, grab-and-go speed
- Food hall experience

ğŸ£ **Pearl Lian** (Duluth/Johns Creek - 8-10 min)
- Pan-Asian: sushi, Thai, Vietnamese, Chinese
- Highly respected, open since 2006
- Some of the best Thai seafood in Atlanta
- Dine-in or delivery

**CASUAL OPTIONS**

ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡¹ **Trattoria one41** (Johns Creek - 10-12 min)
- Southern Italian cuisine
- Highly rated (4.9â˜…), excellent service
- Romantic atmosphere, reservations required

ğŸŒ® **La Industria Mexican Grill** (Peachtree Corners - 5 min)
- Authentic Mexican with modern twists
- Fresh, family-owned
- Great for something casual but elevated

ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ **Eating Americana** (Peachtree Corners - 5 min)
- Great American comfort foods
- Familiar classics, elevated quality
- Relaxed, family-friendly atmosphere

All options are highly rated and within easy driving distance!

comments.author: mccargo21
comments.text: These are good ideas. Let review more asian options and update the list here.

comments.author: Molty
comments.text:
Added 4 Asian restaurant options to the list:
- Sei Ryu (high-end Japanese with omakase)
- Wonder Pho (Vietnamese)
- 26 Thai Kitchen (fast-casual Thai)
- Kimchi Red (Korean fried chicken)
- Pearl Lian (pan-Asian fusion)

Moved to in_progress to action the feedback.
